entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning late this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then clearing. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Monday 3 April 2023
